issue.title: Ignore .hg folder in a model database

content.raw:
These would also be nice to remove:


```
#!bash
Warning [InsertModelWidget.cc:230] Invalid filename or directory["/home/dave/ros/gazebo_models/.hgignore"] in GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH. It's not a good idea to put extra files in a GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH because the file structure may be modified by Gazebo.
Warning [InsertModelWidget.cc:230] Invalid filename or directory["/home/dave/ros/gazebo_models/CMakeLists.txt"] in GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH. It's not a good idea to put extra files in a GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH because the file structure may be modified by Gazebo.
Warning [InsertModelWidget.cc:230] Invalid filename or directory["/home/dave/ros/gazebo_models/LICENSE"] in GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH. It's not a good idea to put extra files in a GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH because the file structure may be modified by Gazebo.
```

These would also be nice to remove:

Warning [InsertModelWidget.cc:230] Invalid filename or directory["/home/dave/ros/gazebo_models/.hgignore"] in GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH. It's not a good idea to put extra files in a GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH because the file structure may be modified by Gazebo.
Warning [InsertModelWidget.cc:230] Invalid filename or directory["/home/dave/ros/gazebo_models/CMakeLists.txt"] in GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH. It's not a good idea to put extra files in a GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH because the file structure may be modified by Gazebo.
Warning [InsertModelWidget.cc:230] Invalid filename or directory["/home/dave/ros/gazebo_models/LICENSE"] in GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH. It's not a good idea to put extra files in a GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH because the file structure may be modified by Gazebo.
